data.comment: The match is underway in Suita.
Jumpei Iida awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 6, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Gamba.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in Gamba.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Kobe.
Kobe pushes forward through Leo Osaki, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 12, Yuya Nakasaka of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
In the minute 16, Gamba push upfield and Kosuke Onose gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Kobe defence.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 19, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe just outside Gamba's area.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Kobe surge into the attack at Panasonic Stadium Suita but Daiju Sasakiâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 22, Gamba have a goal kick.
Daiju Sasaki of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Patric scores to make it 1-0 at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Takashi Usami instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 30, Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kobe throw-in in Gamba's half.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 39, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Gamba.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 42, Gamba will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kobe.
Kobe are whistled for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Jumpei Iida signals a throw-in for Gamba, close to Kobe's area.
Free kick Gamba.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe.
Jumpei Iida awards Gamba a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Suita.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in Kobe.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Gamba.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kobe drives forward and Yuya Nakasaka gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Jumpei Iida.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Kobe make their first substitution with Kyogo Furuhashi replacing Yuya Nakasaka.
Andres Iniesta is on a sub for Takuya Yasui for Kobe.
In the minute 61, Hotaru Yamaguchi is replacing Daiju Sasaki for Kobe at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 66, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Kobe at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
The home team replace Takashi Usami with Kazuma Watanabe.
Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 79, Noriaki Fujimoto is replacing Junya Tanaka for the away team.
Kobe make their fifth substitution with Daigo Nishi replacing Leo Osaki.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a second substitution, with Shinya Yajima replacing Shu Kurata.
In the minute 84, The home team replace Patric with Shoji Toyama.
Jumpei Iida signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In Suita Kobe attack through Noriaki Fujimoto. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 86, Gamba have a goal kick.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jumpei Iida signals a Kobe throw-in in Gamba's half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Kobe.
Jumpei Iida awards the home team a throw-in.
Jumpei Iida awards Gamba a goal kick.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
The match has come to a close in Suita. The final score is 1-0.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto is making the team's fourth substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Kosuke Onose.
